tql.tql:
SELECT id FROM toggl.list_workspaces LIMIT 1
EXPAND BY id

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM toggl.get_detailed_report
  WHERE workspace_id IN (SELECT id from toggl.list_workspaces LIMIT 1)
  AND user_agent='Transposit'
  AND since=@start_date
  AND until=@end_date
